title: 'Return all gifts': SC orders divorced Muslim man to give back wedding gifts received from bride's parents
description: The Supreme Court has ruled that gifts given to a bridegroom at the time of marriage must be returned to the woman if the marriage ends in divorce. The court applied the Muslim Women Protection of Rights on Divorce Act, 1986. This decision sets aside a previo…
content: The Supreme Court has ruled that gifts given by parents to both the daughter and the bridegroom at the time of marriage must be returned to the woman if the marriage ends in divorce. The court applie… [+2611 chars]
